Rain of Toads
Ritual
B3N1

effect number [effect_number]: 42
damage [damage]: 6
range [provrange]: 5 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1

Affect Province with Anonymous Event:Rain of Toads
Can't target same province more than once/turn :1
Cannot target geo mask : (Sea)
The caster creates a horrible omen, turning the falling rain in a target province into toads. The target province will suffer from unrest and misfortune. Soldiers stationed in the province will risk becoming diseased when dead toads fester in the wells.
Unrest +40, misfortune +3, disease chance 4%. Reported as a random event.
